minecraft_tab.name: Minecraft
minecraft_tab.description: The heart and story of the game
minecraft_tab.requirement: Have a crafting table in your inventory

minecraft_tab.name: Stone Age
minecraft_tab.description: Mine stone with your new pickaxe
minecraft_tab.requirement: Have any stone_tool_materials item in your inventory

minecraft_tab.name: Getting an Upgrade
minecraft_tab.requirement: Have a stone pickaxe in your inventory

minecraft_tab.name: Acquire Hardware
minecraft_tab.requirement: Have an iron ingot in your inventory

minecraft_tab.name: Suit Up
minecraft_tab.description: Protect yourself with a piece of iron armor
minecraft_tab.requirement: Have any piece of armor in your inventory

minecraft_tab.name: Hot Stuff
minecraft_tab.requirement: Have a lava bucket in your inventory

minecraft_tab.name: Isn't It Iron Pick
minecraft_tab.requirement: Have an iron pickaxe in your inventory

minecraft_tab.name: Not Today, Thank You
minecraft_tab.description: Deflect a projectile with a shield
minecraft_tab.requirement: Successfully deflect a projectile with a shield

minecraft_tab.name: Diamonds!
minecraft_tab.requirement: Have a diamond in your inventory

minecraft_tab.name: We Need to Go Deeper
minecraft_tab.description: Build, light and enter a Nether Portal

minecraft_tab.name: Cover Me With Diamonds
minecraft_tab.requirement: Have all pieces of diamond armor in your inventory

minecraft_tab.name: Enchanter
minecraft_tab.description: Enchant an item at an Enchanting Table
minecraft_tab.requirement: Use an enchanting table, then apply an enchantment

minecraft_tab.name: Zombie Doctor
minecraft_tab.description: Weaken and then cure a Zombie Villager
minecraft_tab.requirement: Feed a golden apple to a zombie villager under the Weakness effect until it converts into a villager

nether_tab.name: Nether
nether_tab.description: Bring summer clothes
nether_tab.requirement: Enter the Nether dimension

nether_tab.name: Return to Sender
nether_tab.description: Destroy a Ghast with a fireball
nether_tab.requirement: Kill a Ghast with its own fireball

nether_tab.name: Those Were the Days
nether_tab.description: Enter a Bastion Remnant
nether_tab.requirement: Enter a bastion remnant

nether_tab.name: Hidden in the Depths
nether_tab.description: Obtain Ancient Debris
nether_tab.requirement: Have ancient debris in your inventory

nether_tab.name: Subspace Bubble
nether_tab.description: Use the Nether to travel 7 km in the Overworld
nether_tab.requirement: Travel between 2 points in the Overworld with 7000 blocks horizontal distance via the Nether (875 blocks in Nether)

nether_tab.name: A Terrible Fortress
nether_tab.description: Break your way into a Nether Fortress
nether_tab.requirement: Enter a Nether Fortress

nether_tab.name: Who is Cutting Onions?
nether_tab.description: Obtain Crying Obsidian
nether_tab.requirement: Have Crying Obsidian in your inventory

nether_tab.name: Oh Shiny
nether_tab.description: Distract Piglins with gold
nether_tab.requirement: Give a piglin one of 25 gold-related items from the piglin_loved item tag

nether_tab.name: This Boat Has Legs
nether_tab.description: Ride a Strider with a Warped Fungus on a Stick
nether_tab.requirement: Boost a strider with a warped fungus on a stick

nether_tab.name: Uneasy Alliance
nether_tab.description: Rescue a Ghast from the Nether, bring it safely home to the Overworld... and then kill it
nether_tab.requirement: Kill a ghast while in the Overworld

nether_tab.name: War Pigs
nether_tab.description: Loot a chest in a Bastion Remnant
nether_tab.requirement: Open a chest in a bastion remnant

nether_tab.name: Country Lode, Take Me Home
nether_tab.description: Use a Compass on a Lodestone
nether_tab.requirement: Use a Compass on a Lodestone

nether_tab.name: Cover Me in Debris
nether_tab.description: Get a full suit of Netherite armor
nether_tab.requirement: Have all pieces of netherite armor in your inventory

nether_tab.name: Spooky Scary Skeleton
nether_tab.description: Obtain a Wither Skeleton's skull
nether_tab.requirement: Have a wither skeleton skull in your inventory

nether_tab.name: Into Fire
nether_tab.description: Relieve a Blaze of its rod
nether_tab.requirement: Have a blaze rod in your inventory

nether_tab.name: Not Quite "Nine" Lives
nether_tab.description: Charge a Respawn Anchor to the maximum
nether_tab.requirement: Fully charge a Respawn Anchor

nether_tab.name: Feels Like Home
nether_tab.description: Take a Strider for a loooong ride on a lava lake in the Overworld
nether_tab.requirement: Ride a strider on lava in the Overworld for 50 blocks horizontally

nether_tab.name: Hot Tourist Destinations
nether_tab.description: Explore all Nether biomes
nether_tab.requirement: Visit all 5 Nether biomes

nether_tab.name: Withering Heights
nether_tab.description: Summon the Wither
nether_tab.requirement: Summon a Wither

nether_tab.name: Local Brewery
nether_tab.description: Brew a Potion
nether_tab.requirement: Pick up an item from a brewing stand potion slot

nether_tab.name: Bring Home the Beacon
nether_tab.description: Construct and place a Beacon
nether_tab.requirement: Be near a beacon block when it realizes it has become powered

nether_tab.name: A Furious Cocktail
nether_tab.description: Have every potion effect applied at the same time
nether_tab.requirement: Have all 13 specified potion effects applied simultaneously

nether_tab.name: Beaconator
nether_tab.description: Bring a beacon to full power
nether_tab.requirement: Be near a beacon powered by a size 4 pyramid

nether_tab.name: How Did We Get Here?
nether_tab.description: Have every effect applied at the same time
nether_tab.requirement: Have all 33 status effects applied at the same time

the_end_tab.name: The Next Generation
the_end_tab.requirement: Have a dragon egg in your inventory

the_end_tab.name: Remote Getaway
the_end_tab.requirement: Throw an ender pearl through, fly, or walk into an end gateway

the_end_tab.name: The End... Again...
the_end_tab.requirement: Summon the ender dragon using end crystals

the_end_tab.name: You Need a Mint
the_end_tab.description: Collect Dragon's Breath in a Glass Bottle
the_end_tab.requirement: Have Dragon's Breath in your inventory

the_end_tab.name: The City at the End of the Game
the_end_tab.description: Go on in, what could happen?

the_end_tab.name: Great View From Up Here
the_end_tab.description: Levitate up 50 blocks from the attacks of a Shulker
the_end_tab.requirement: Rise 50 blocks vertically with the Levitation effect

adventure_tab.name: Adventure
adventure_tab.description: Adventure, exploration, and combat
adventure_tab.requirement: Kill any entity, or be killed by any entity

adventure_tab.name: Voluntary Exile
adventure_tab.description: Kill a raid captain. Maybe consider staying away from villages for the time being...
adventure_tab.requirement: Kill any entity from the raiders tag wearing an ominous banner

adventure_tab.name: Is It a Bird?
adventure_tab.description: Look at a Parrot through a Spyglass
adventure_tab.requirement: View a Parrot through a Spyglass

adventure_tab.name: Monster Hunter
adventure_tab.description: Kill any hostile monster
adventure_tab.requirement: Kill one of 36 specified hostile mobs

adventure_tab.name: The Power of Books
adventure_tab.description: Read the power signal of a Chiseled Bookshelf using a Comparator
adventure_tab.requirement: Read a chiseled bookshelf with a comparator

adventure_tab.name: What a Deal!
adventure_tab.description: Successfully trade with a Villager
adventure_tab.requirement: Take an item from a villager or wandering trader's trading output slot

adventure_tab.name: Smithing with Style
adventure_tab.description: Apply these smithing templates at least once: Spire, Snout, Rib, Ward, Silence, Vex, Tide, Wayfinder
adventure_tab.requirement: Apply any armor trim pattern

adventure_tab.name: Sticky Situation
adventure_tab.description: Jump into a Honey Block to break your fall
adventure_tab.requirement: Collide with a Honey Block to break a fall

adventure_tab.name: Ol' Betsy
adventure_tab.description: Shoot a Crossbow
adventure_tab.requirement: Shoot a Crossbow

adventure_tab.name: Surge Protector
adventure_tab.description: Protect a Villager from an undesired shock without starting a fire
adventure_tab.requirement: Protect a villager from lightning with a lightning rod

adventure_tab.name: Caves & Cliffs
adventure_tab.description: Free fall from the top of the world (build limit) to the bottom of the world and survive
adventure_tab.requirement: Fall from Y=320 to Y=-59 and survive

adventure_tab.name: Respecting the Remnants
adventure_tab.description: Brush a Suspicious block to obtain a Pottery Sherd
adventure_tab.requirement: Brush a suspicious block to get a pottery sherd

adventure_tab.name: Sneak 100
adventure_tab.description: Sneaking next to a Sculk Sensor or Warden to prevent it from detecting you
adventure_tab.requirement: Avoid vibrations while near a sculk sensor or warden

adventure_tab.name: Sweet Dreams
adventure_tab.description: Sleep in a Bed
adventure_tab.requirement: Enter a bed

adventure_tab.name: Hero of the Village
adventure_tab.description: Successfully defend a village from a raid
adventure_tab.requirement: Successfully defend a raid

adventure_tab.name: Is It a Balloon?
adventure_tab.description: Look at a Ghast through a Spyglass
adventure_tab.requirement: View a Ghast through a Spyglass

adventure_tab.name: A Throwaway Joke
adventure_tab.description: Throw a trident at something. Note: Throwing away your only weapon is not a good idea.
adventure_tab.requirement: Kill a mob with a thrown trident

adventure_tab.name: It Spreads
adventure_tab.description: Kill a mob near a Sculk Catalyst
adventure_tab.requirement: Kill any of 81 specified mobs near a Sculk Catalyst

adventure_tab.name: Take Aim
adventure_tab.description: Shoot something with an arrow
adventure_tab.requirement: Shoot an entity with an arrow or tipped/spectral arrow

adventure_tab.name: Monsters Hunted
adventure_tab.description: Kill one of every hostile monster
adventure_tab.requirement: Kill all 38 specified hostile mobs

adventure_tab.name: Postmortal
adventure_tab.description: Use a Totem of Undying to cheat death
adventure_tab.requirement: Use a Totem of Undying

adventure_tab.name: Hired Help
adventure_tab.description: Summon an Iron Golem to help defend a village
adventure_tab.requirement: Summon an Iron Golem

adventure_tab.name: Star Trader
adventure_tab.description: Trade with a Villager at the build height limit
adventure_tab.requirement: Trade with a villager at Y=320 or above

adventure_tab.name: Smithing with Style
adventure_tab.description: Apply all exclusive armor trims
adventure_tab.requirement: Apply all exclusive armor trim patterns

adventure_tab.name: Two Birds, One Arrow
adventure_tab.description: Kill two Phantoms with a piercing arrow
adventure_tab.requirement: Kill two phantoms with one arrow using a crossbow with Piercing

adventure_tab.name: Who's the Pillager Now?
adventure_tab.description: Give a Pillager a taste of their own medicine
adventure_tab.requirement: Kill a pillager with a crossbow

adventure_tab.name: Arbalistic
adventure_tab.description: Kill five unique mobs with one crossbow shot
adventure_tab.requirement: Kill five different mobs with a single crossbow shot

adventure_tab.name: Careful Restoration
adventure_tab.description: Make a Decorated Pot out of 4 Pottery Sherds
adventure_tab.requirement: Craft a decorated pot using only pottery sherds

adventure_tab.name: Adventuring Time
adventure_tab.description: Discover every biome
adventure_tab.requirement: Visit all 61 Overworld biomes

adventure_tab.name: Sound of Music
adventure_tab.description: Make the Meadows come alive with the sound of music from a jukebox
adventure_tab.requirement: Play a music disc in a jukebox in a meadows biome

adventure_tab.name: Light as a Rabbit
adventure_tab.description: Walk on Powder Snow... without sinking in it
adventure_tab.requirement: Walk on powder snow with leather boots

adventure_tab.name: Is It a Plane?
adventure_tab.description: Look at the Ender Dragon through a Spyglass
adventure_tab.requirement: View an Ender Dragon through a Spyglass

adventure_tab.name: Very Very Frightening
adventure_tab.description: Strike a Villager with lightning
adventure_tab.requirement: Hit a villager with lightning using a trident with Channeling

adventure_tab.name: Sniper Duel
adventure_tab.description: Kill a Skeleton from at least 50 meters away
adventure_tab.requirement: Kill a skeleton with an arrow from 50+ meters away

adventure_tab.name: Bullseye
adventure_tab.description: Hit the bullseye of a Target block from at least 30 meters away
adventure_tab.requirement: Hit a target block from 30+ meters away

husbandry_tab.name: Husbandry
husbandry_tab.description: The world is full of friends and food
husbandry_tab.requirement: Consume anything that can be eaten

husbandry_tab.name: Bee Our Guest
husbandry_tab.description: Use a Campfire to collect Honey from a Beehive using a Glass Bottle without aggravating the Bees
husbandry_tab.requirement: Use a glass bottle on a beehive/bee nest while not angering bees

husbandry_tab.name: The Parrots and the Bats
husbandry_tab.description: Breed two animals together
husbandry_tab.requirement: Breed any two breedable mobs

husbandry_tab.name: You've Got a Friend in Me
husbandry_tab.description: Have an Allay deliver items to you
husbandry_tab.requirement: Have an allay deliver an item to you

husbandry_tab.name: Whatever Floats Your Goat!
husbandry_tab.description: Get in a Boat and float with a Goat
husbandry_tab.requirement: Ride in a boat with a goat

husbandry_tab.name: Best Friends Forever
husbandry_tab.description: Tame an animal
husbandry_tab.requirement: Tame one of: cat, donkey, horse, llama, parrot, or wolf

husbandry_tab.name: Glow and Behold!
husbandry_tab.description: Make the text of any kind of sign glow
husbandry_tab.requirement: Use a glow ink sac on a sign or hanging sign

husbandry_tab.name: Fishy Business
husbandry_tab.description: Catch a fish
husbandry_tab.requirement: Catch cod, salmon, pufferfish, or tropical fish with a fishing rod

husbandry_tab.name: Total Beelocation
husbandry_tab.description: Move and place a Bee Nest, with 3 Bees inside, using Silk Touch
husbandry_tab.requirement: Move a bee nest with 3 bees using Silk Touch

husbandry_tab.name: Bukkit Bukkit
husbandry_tab.description: Catch a Tadpole in a Bucket
husbandry_tab.requirement: Use a water bucket on a tadpole

husbandry_tab.name: Smells Interesting
husbandry_tab.description: Obtain a Sniffer Egg
husbandry_tab.requirement: Have a sniffer egg in your inventory

husbandry_tab.name: A Seedy Place
husbandry_tab.description: Plant any Sniffer seed
husbandry_tab.requirement: Plant a seed

husbandry_tab.name: Wax On
husbandry_tab.description: Apply Honeycomb to a Copper block!
husbandry_tab.requirement: Wax a copper block with honeycomb

husbandry_tab.name: Two by Two
husbandry_tab.description: Breed all the animals!
husbandry_tab.requirement: Breed all 26 breedable mobs

husbandry_tab.name: Birthday Song
husbandry_tab.description: Have an Allay drop a Cake at a Note Block
husbandry_tab.requirement: Have an allay drop a cake at a note block

husbandry_tab.name: A Complete Catalogue
husbandry_tab.description: Tame all Cat variants!
husbandry_tab.requirement: Tame all 11 cat variants

husbandry_tab.name: Tactical Fishing
husbandry_tab.description: Catch a fish... without a fishing rod!
husbandry_tab.requirement: Use a water bucket on any fish mob

husbandry_tab.name: When the Squad Hops into Town
husbandry_tab.description: Get each Frog variant on a Lead
husbandry_tab.requirement: Leash all 3 frog variants

husbandry_tab.name: Little Sniffs
husbandry_tab.description: Feed a Snifflet
husbandry_tab.requirement: Feed a snifflet

husbandry_tab.name: A Balanced Diet
husbandry_tab.description: Eat everything that is edible, even if it's not good for you
husbandry_tab.requirement: Eat all 41 specified foods

husbandry_tab.name: Serious Dedication
husbandry_tab.description: Use a Netherite Ingot to upgrade a Hoe, and then reevaluate your life choices
husbandry_tab.requirement: Have a netherite hoe in your inventory

husbandry_tab.name: Wax Off
husbandry_tab.description: Scrape Wax off of a Copper block!
husbandry_tab.requirement: Use an axe to scrape wax from a copper block

husbandry_tab.name: The Cutest Predator
husbandry_tab.description: Catch an Axolotl in a Bucket
husbandry_tab.requirement: Use a water bucket on an axolotl

husbandry_tab.name: With Our Powers Combined!
husbandry_tab.description: Have all Froglights in your inventory
husbandry_tab.requirement: Have all 3 froglights in inventory

husbandry_tab.name: Planting the Past
husbandry_tab.description: Plant any Sniffer seed
husbandry_tab.requirement: Plant a torchflower seed or pitcher pod

husbandry_tab.name: The Healing Power of Friendship!
husbandry_tab.description: Team up with an axolotl and win a fight
husbandry_tab.requirement: Get a Regeneration effect from helping an axolotl kill a mob
